Plot: A drama about the awakening of the painter Margaret Keane, her phenomenal success in the 1950s, and the subsequent legal difficulties she had with her husband, who claimed credit for her works in the 1960s.
Title: Big Eyes
Actors: Amy Adams, Christoph Waltz, Danny Huston, Krysten Ritter
tomatoConsensus: Well-acted, thought-provoking, and a refreshing change of pace for Tim Burton, Big Eyes works both as a biopic and as a timelessly relevant piece of social commentary.
Awards: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win & 15 nominations.
